# INTERMACS-missing-data

[![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/298893426.svg)](https://zenodo.org/badge/latestdoi/298893426)


This repository contains all of the code used in the paper _Improving Outcome Predictions for Patients Receiving Mechanical Circulatory Support by Optimizing Imputation of Missing Values_.
